title: Users intermittently cannot log in
symptoms: Some users get 'Invalid session' and are forced to re-login repeatedly.
steps_to_reproduce: Attempt login, wait ~2 minutes, refresh page, repeat.

title: Morning slowdown in dashboard loading
symptoms: Dashboard takes 8–15 seconds to load between 8:30–9:30am.
steps_to_reproduce: Open dashboard route /dashboard during peak hours.

title: Monthly report totals don't match expected values
symptoms: Monthly totals appear inflated for some departments.
steps_to_reproduce: Run the monthly summary report for last month and compare to raw entries.
